sentences.en: Add water and knead until the dough is smooth.
sentences.cn: 加入水,把面团搓揉到足够柔软.

sentences.en: Combine all the ingredients for the dough and mix until dough forms . Knead dough until smooth.
sentences.cn: 把面团的所有材料混合均匀后,揉搓至面团完全光滑不粘手.

sentences.en: Fold in sifted flours and baking powder, use hand to knead and forms dough.
sentences.cn: 将筛过得面粉和发粉加入, 用手搓揉成面团.

sentences.en: Ha ha, you fell into trap. I now knead still in Peking.
sentences.cn: 呵呵, 你们上当了. 我现在还在北京捏.

sentences.en: Having been long sitting there, I have to knead the lame muscles of my legs.
sentences.cn: 因为在那儿坐了很久, 我不得不按摩我那僵硬的腿部肌肉.

sentences.en: Knead for the last time and shape into loaf or rolls and place upon a pan.
sentences.cn: 最后一次揉制并成形为条状或卷状,放入烤盘中.

sentences.en: Knead the dough for three minutes.
Knead the dough on a floured surface.
sentences.cn: 在撒了面粉的案板上揉面团。

sentences.en: Knead the dough to the right consistency.
sentences.cn: 把面团揉到适合的黏稠度.

sentences.en: Lightly knead the mixture on a floured surface.
sentences.cn: 在撒上面粉的台面上轻揉该混合物。

sentences.en: Mix all the dough ingredients and knead vigorously.
sentences.cn: 把面团的所有材料混合,揉搓成团.

sentences.en: Mix and knead until the dough unsticky and smooth.
sentences.cn: 揉搓至面团不粘手且光滑.

sentences.en: Punch down the dough, knead briefly and cut into 4 equal pieces.
sentences.cn: 将面团气体排除, 稍微擀揉后匀切成4块.

sentences.en: She felt him knead the aching muscles.
sentences.cn: 她感到他在按摩她酸痛的肌肉。

sentences.en: To make bread, you must knead the dough first.
sentences.cn: 要做面包, 你首先必须揉面团.

trans.tran_en: to press a mixture of flour and water many times with your hands

trans.tran_cn: 揉，捏（面团、湿粘土等），按摩，揉捏（肌肉等）
